reviews.text: Poor accessibility and lack of seating and facilities makes this quite a poor station overall. At least you get a ticket machine and shelter and a decent amount of trains stopping there.
No parking, long steep flight of stairs so no wheelchairs! No toilet or ticket office. You have to buy ticket at machine. There is a good all weather cover area with seating.
Total dump .nice place to be mugged always full ov scum.
Decent small stop on the way too and from Central station to places in the vale, huge platform with a lot of steps to climb to get there

Badly served, trains always late and if they are exceedingly late for whatever reason they do not even stop here. The roof was badly engineered and in case of rain it is not effective as it has holes and it very tall. Security cameras do not seem to be enough to deter smoking and crime near the premises of the station. It is only accessible by a long, steep and slippery staircase, unsuitable for heavy-luggage travellers and disabled people.
